{{BLP sources|date=July 2014}} {{Use mdy dates|date=April 2014}} {{Infobox ice hockey player | name = Marko Virtanen | image = | caption = | image_size = 225px | played_for = '''''[[SM-liiga]]'''''
[[JYP Jyväskylä]]
'''''[[Swedish Hockey League|Elitserien]]'''''
[[Färjestad BK]]
[[Södertälje SK]] | position = [[Winger (ice hockey)|Right Wing]] | height_ft = 5 | height_in = 10 | weight_lb = 181 | shoots = Left | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1968|12|10}} | birth_place = [[Jyväskylä]], [[Finland]] | draft = Undrafted | career_start = 1988 | career_end = 2000 }} '''Marko Virtanen''' (born December 10, 1968) is a [[Finland|Finnish]] former professional [[ice hockey]] player. He is currently the head coach of [[JYP Jyväskylä]] in the Finnish [[Liiga]]. Virtanen assumed the position of head coach for JYP with the [[2013–14 Liiga season]].{{cite web | url=http://www.jypliiga.fi/uutiset/marko-virtanen-jypin-paavalmentajaksi-2013-2015 | title=Marko Virtanen JYPin päävalmentajaksi 2013 – 2015 | publisher=Jypliiga | accessdate=25 July 2014 | deadurl=yes | archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20150316112244/http://www.jypliiga.fi/uutiset/marko-virtanen-jypin-paavalmentajaksi-2013-2015 | archivedate=March 16, 2015 | df=mdy-all }} ==References== {{ }} ==External links== *{{Eliteprospects}} *{{hockeydb|34132|Marko Virtanen}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Virtanen, Marko}} [[Category:1968 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Färjestad BK players]] [[Category:Finnish ice hockey coaches]] [[Category:Finnish ice hockey players]] [[Category:JYP Jyväskylä players]] [[Category:Södertälje SK players]] {{Finland-icehockey-player-stub}}
